articles.title: Criminals stole over $1bn in cryptocurrency in just three months
articles.description: FBI issues official warning about the dangers of investing in decentralized finance (DeFi).
articles.content:
Audio player loading…
If you're thinking of investing in decentralized finance (DeFi), the FBI wants you to think twice, as cybercriminals stole $1.3bn in cryptocurrency in just three months this year.

articles.title: Cryptocurrency prices today: Bitcoin hovers around $20k
articles.description: Cryptocurrency prices today: Ether, the coin linked to the ethereum blockchain, declined more than 3%
articles.content: Cryptocurrency prices today plunged with Bitcoin hovering around $20,000 once again, as hawkish comments from the Federal Reserve about inflation and the economic slowdown continue to weigh on riskier assets. The world's largest and most popular cryp... [1757 chars]

articles.title: How this crypto-mining malware infected PCs through fake Google Translate app
articles.description: After the downloading of this malicious app, the malware installation process is triggered via a scheduled task mechanism. Later, this harmful malware puts in place a sophisticated mining setup for the Monero cryptocurrency based on the energy-intensive proof of work mining model.
articles.content: Recently, a crypto mining malware which was disguised as a Google Translate app, has been foraying into thousands of computers. According to a study by Check Point Research (CPR), this malware called the “Nitokod" has been developed by a Turkey based... [2118 chars]

articles.title: Matt Damon-backed crypto firm sent woman $10M
articles.description: The cryptocurrency firm that hired Matt Damon as a pitchman for its Super Bowl commercial mistakenly wired $10.4 million to an Australian woman.
articles.content:
The cryptocurrency firm that hired Matt Damon as a pitchman for its Super Bowl commercial last year mistakenly wired $10.4 million to an Australian woman who then used the money to buy a mansion for her sister in Melbourne, according to a report.
